title: Bastard
author: Carnby Kim
synopsis: A boy lives with his serial killer father and must decide whether to protect his new friend or betray his father.

title: Sweet Home
author: Carnby Kim
synopsis: Cha Hyun-soo and the residents of an apartment building try to survive against terrifying monsters in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Killing Stalking
author: Koogi
synopsis: A disturbing story of obsession and violence as a boy becomes entangled in the life of a murderer he idolizes.

title: DICE: The Cube that Changes Everything
author: Hyunseok Yun
synopsis: A boy stumbles upon a dice that can change his life in any way he desires, but every roll comes with a price.

title: The Village: Achiara's Secret
author: Shin Young-woo
synopsis: A woman moves to a quiet village, only to discover dark secrets and a series of murders that unravel the community.

title: Mercilessness
author: Sae Hwang
synopsis: A psychological thriller that delves into the mind of a woman seeking revenge on those who wronged her.

title: Hunt: Showdown
author: Ryuji
synopsis: In a dystopian world, hunters chase down terrifying creatures while facing betrayal and deception from each other.

title: The Last Human
author: Lian Yu
synopsis: A man wakes up in a post-apocalyptic world where he is the last human, confronting monsters and hidden dangers.

title: Gosu
author: Ryu Ki-Woon
synopsis: A martial artist seeks revenge against those who betrayed his master, leading to a tale of blood and vengeance.

title: Killer's Class
author: Han Dong-Woo
synopsis: A school for assassins trains students in the art of killing, but betrayal and danger lurk around every corner.
